description:
Would you like to create quality Album Covers whenever you need them?

Are you tired of paying graphic designers money that could be used for promotion?

Canva: Make Your Own Professional Album Covers is a course that will teach you how to design professional Album Cover designs.

In under an hour you will learn:

  • What Canva is
  • How to upload your own images
  • How to access over 1 Million FREE images
  • Professional design techniques a child could use
  • How to add various elements like shapes & vectors 
  • How to edit every feature in Canva
  • How to customize remade templates & layouts
  • How to do research for your genre specific design
  • How to navigate the program
  • And much more!

Enroll in this quick and easy to understand course to save hundreds of dollars that you would have to pay a graphic designer and learn to MAKE YOUR OWN ALBUM COVERS using Canva!! For the cost a few meals you can learn a skill that you can use to not only help improve the image of your brand but also make you money. 

See you on the other side!
title: Canva Tutorial: How to Design Professional Album Covers
